title: Instructional Design Project Workshop for Strengthening 21st-Century Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental instructional design theory and digital content development experience
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education for current professionals, emphasizing learning experiences through project development using digital devices and peer feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the difference in 21st-century competency enhancement effects between RPM and DCM models by applying comparative-causal research design methodologies.
Project-Based Learning (PBL) substantially enhances time management skills and digital content creation competencies.
Learners can recognize challenges arising during collaboration and develop strategies to overcome them.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
